name: Epic Royal
description: up to 100 players are droped on to a island to fight to the death only 1 will live
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Processor Q6600 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-650 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
